summary: Completed initial testing of seller listing limits and plan restrictions feature. Found critical routing and authentication issues preventing full testing of the implemented functionality.

database_issues.issue: Column 's.name' does not exist in database queries
database_issues.impact: Causes 400 errors in property listing queries but app falls back to direct queries

ui_bugs.issue: Seller role radio button not clickable due to label overlay
Signup page and upgrade plan page redirect to homepage

integration_issues.issue: Cannot complete seller registration due to form interaction issues
Cannot access upgrade plan page - redirects to homepage

authentication_issues.issue: Authentication guards may be preventing access to seller-specific pages

passed_tests: Homepage loads successfully with property listings
Signup form fields can be filled (name, email, password)
Plan definitions are correctly configured in /lib/plans.ts
Auth system structure is properly implemented in /lib/auth.ts

success_percentage.frontend: 30% - Critical routing and form interaction issues
success_percentage.overall: 40% - Major functionality blocked by UI issues

action_item_for_E1: Fix critical routing issues preventing access to signup and upgrade plan pages. Resolve seller role selection in signup form. Investigate authentication guards that may be blocking page access. Address Supabase database schema issues (missing 's.name' column).

plan_system_implementation.details: Plan definitions are correctly configured with Free (1 listing), Basic (5 listings), Pro (10 listings), Enterprise (20 listings)

auth_system.details: In-memory auth system with localStorage persistence, automatic Free plan assignment for sellers

routing_issues.details: Critical routing problems prevent testing of core functionality. Pages redirect to homepage instead of loading correctly.

form_interactions.details: Form fields work but radio button selection is blocked by label overlay issues

unable_to_test: New seller signup with Free plan assignment
testing_limitations.reason: Critical routing and form interaction issues prevent access to core functionality
